creator: Aditya Birla Capital Limited
descriptionHtml:
Is your phone cluttered with multiple apps to manage your Insurance policies, Investments and Loans? It’s time you choose the Aditya Birla Capital App, which enables you to service all your Protecting, Investing and Financing solutions on one App. You can log in after creating your One ID Account by linking your various ABC products to it.

o Get an overview of your products
o Raise a new request and track old requests
o Pay your Insurance Premium
o Check your Fund’s Performance
o File an Insurance Claim
o Track your Loan Application
o Buy a new Insurance Policy
o Start a new SIP
o Apply for a new Loan
o Get instant access to your Advisor’s details
o Download your documents
o And much more. . .

As an ABC Customer, you also have the privilege of receiving pre-approved offers from us on Life Insurance, Health Insurance and Loans.

If you need assistance at any time we have our Agents available to guide you through ABC Assist inside the App.

All you need to do is download the Aditya Birla Capital App and managing your money will become as simple as A B C.
descriptionShort: One App to service all ABC Protecting, Investing and Financing Solutions.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. download functionality of Health Insurance, Home Finance documents
2. app exit only on user confirmation
3. device back button functionality across Health Insurance, Life Insurance

title: Aditya Birla Capital

creator: Aditya Birla Capital Limited
descriptionHtml:
Is your phone cluttered with multiple apps to manage your Insurance policies, Investments and Loans? It’s time you choose the Aditya Birla Capital App, which enables you to service all your Protecting, Investing and Financing solutions on one App. You can log in after creating your One ID Account by linking your various ABC products to it.

o Get an overview of your products
o Raise a new request and track old requests
o Pay your Insurance Premium
o Check your Fund’s Performance
o File an Insurance Claim
o Track your Loan Application
o Buy a new Insurance Policy
o Start a new SIP
o Apply for a new Loan
o Get instant access to your Advisor’s details
o Download your documents
o And much more. . .

As an ABC Customer, you also have the privilege of receiving pre-approved offers from us on Life Insurance, Health Insurance and Loans.

If you need assistance at any time we have our Agents available to guide you through ABC Assist inside the App.

All you need to do is download the Aditya Birla Capital App and managing your money will become as simple as A B C.

With regards to Personal Loan refer below information
Minimum and maximum period for repayment – Total loan tenure may vary from 12 months to 84 months. However, we provide customer an option to pre-pay the entire loan whenever customer wants to.
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR). – Rate depends on various factors, type of customers, etc. It may vary from 10.99% p.a. to 29% p.a.
Representative example of the total cost of the loan, including the principal and all applicable fees (for example, sample monthly payment, sample interest calculation) – Please refer below:
ABFL DLOD loan is structured as follows
Loan Amount : ₹ 10,00,000
ROI : 15%
Tenure : 36 months
EMI : ₹ 34,665 to be paid for 36 months
Processing Fees : 1.5% of loan amount, ie., Rs. 15000
Stamp Duty : Depends on the state (ranges from Rs. 200 to 0.2% of the loan amount)
AMC : 0.25% of Dropline Balance, i.e., Principal Outstanding as per repayment schedule generated at the time of loan disbursement. It will be charged at the anniversary of loan.
Total charges is inclusive of GST & Insurance
Repayment Schedule:

descriptionShort: One App to service all ABC Protecting, Investing and Financing Solutions.
title:
Aditya Birla Capital
1.18

creator: Aditya Birla Financial Shared Services Limited
descriptionHtml:
Aditya Birla Capital App: Your Trusted Financial Partner



Manage your finances easily with Aditya Birla Capital App, designed to elevate your experience as a customer. Whether you’d like to track all your existing holdings, loans, & insurance in one place or seek help and support, the ABC App has it all in a unified, user-friendly experience.

Simply sign in with your mobile number registered across your holdings at Aditya Birla Capital.

Manage Your Insurance with Ease



The ABC App is built to serve your insurance requirements seamlessly: you can pay your premiums, track your policy, and file claims. Get real-time updates on your existing coverage & handle service-related tasks easily, such as updating your nominees, address, phone numbers, etc. All your queries can now be answered instantly by SimpliFI, our AI chatbot.

Track and Grow Your Investments



Track the performance of your existing Mutual Funds, Stocks, and other investments and make adjustments as required. Access detailed reports conveniently from your phone. If you’re looking to tweaking your existing portfolio as per your needs, the app will empower you with the services you need to manage it stress-free.

Hassle-Free Loan Management



If you are an existing borrower, the ABC App helps you manage service requests related to all kinds of loans you currently hold. You can raise disbursement requests, download statements, register for ENACH and even request to change your EMI tenure/dates right from the app!

Highlights of Personal Loan

✓ Loan Amount: Minimum of ₹50,000 to Maximum of ₹10 lakhs
✓ Repayment Tenure: Minimum of 12 months to Maximum of 36 months
✓ Rate of Interest: 10.99% to 30% p.a.
✓ Processing Fees: 2% + 18% GST (of processing fee)
✓ Flexible repayment option
✓ No collateral required

Lending Partner: Aditya Birla Finance Limited.

Note:

1 - The repayment tenure is greater than 60 days for all loan applications
2 - Annualized percentage rate (APR) including interest, costs and fees is less than 36% per annum.

Personal Loan for Salaried Individuals (Example):

◼ Loan Amount: ₹1,00,000
◼ Tenure: 18 months
◼ Rate of Interest (interest rate on reducing balance method): 18.5% per annum
◼ Processing Fee (2%): ₹2,000
◼ GST on Processing Fee (18%): ₹360
◼ Total Interest: ₹ 14,880
◼ APR (Annualized Percentage Rate): 21.72% per annum
◼ Amount Disbursed: ₹ 97,640
◼ EMI: ₹6,404
◼ Total Repayment Amount: ₹1,14,880

Pan India Reach

The Aditya Birla Capital App serves customers across India. Whether you're investing, insuring, or borrowing, the ABC App is your trusted financial companion. Let us serve you while you manage your finances easily.

Experience unmatched customer service - download the App today!
descriptionShort: Track your existing Insurance, Investments, Loans & Credit Cards with ABC.

Elphinstone Road Mumbai 400013
